api_list.api_description: Retrieve a random user in a specified format.

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: The format to return the data in. Values can be 'json', 'xml', 'csv', 'yaml'.

query: I need a random user profile in CSV format. Also, decode this UUID 'b01eb720-171a-11ea-b949-73c91bba743d' to find its version and variant.
